4E800020 00000000

It forces a random damage animation to occur at will.

Info:
Line 1 determines the activator value. (Default: 02000000)

Game Version: 4.2

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Players Supported:
 • Wii U GamePad

Enable:
 • Flick Down

See Button Activators:
https://pastebin.com/iYs6n7Sb
